tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hospital_reports (
	hospital_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	hospital_name VARCHAR(255),
	num_patients INT,
	num_doctors INT,
	avg_patient_stay_duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE PatientFlowOptimization ( 
  patient_id INT, 
  admission_date DATE, 
  discharge_date DATE, 
  department VARCHAR(255), 
  attending_physician VARCHAR(255) 
);

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  patient_dob DATE NOT NULL,
  admission_date DATE NOT NULL,
  discharge_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Patient (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    doctor_id INT,
    hospital_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES Doctor(doctor_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (hospital_id) REFERENCES Hospital(hospital_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Hospital { hospital_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 hospital_name VARCHAR(255),
 location VARCHAR(255),
 capacity INT,
 rating FLOAT
}

CREATE TABLE Department { department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 department_name VARCHAR(255),
 head_of_department VARCHAR(255),
 hospital_id INT REFERENCES Hospital(hospital_id)
}

CREATE TABLE Doctor { doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 doctor_name VARCHAR(255),
 department_id INT REFERENCES Department(department_id),
 specialization VARCHAR(255),
 experience INT
}

CREATE TABLE Patient { patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_name VARCHAR(255),
 age INT,
 admission_date DATE,
 discharge_date DATE
}

CREATE TABLE Appointment { appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 doctor_id INT REFERENCES Doctor(doctor_id),
 patient_id INT REFERENCES Patient(patient_id),
 appointment_date DATE,
 status VARCHAR(50)
}
